Html:
I made a "work item" detailing this a few weeks ago, but I now realize it is probably not a bug but rather an mistake on my end.  Could anyone please pinpoint what I'm doing wrong?

I installed QuickGraph via Nuget, on Visual Studio Professional 2010. I can now access the assemblies QuickGraph, QuickGraph.Algorithms, QuickGraph.Collections, QuickGraph.Contracts, QuickGraph.Data, QuickGraph.Graphviz, QuickGraph.Predicates, and QuickGraph.Serialization. However, when I try to import the glee extensions via "using QuickGraph.Glee", it cannot find the assembly. How do I access the QuickGraph.Glee methods?

Thank you for your help!

same problem here.
there no reference for Quickgraph.Glee imported
